title: When Our Eyes Met
description: That moment when I saw you for the first time, and the whole world stood still. I didn't know it then, but my heart had already chosen you.

title: Words That Sparked Forever
description: Our first real conversation â€” hours felt like minutes, and I realized I could talk to you for a lifetime and never run out of things to say.

title: Your Smile, My Weakness
description: The first time you laughed at something I said, I knew I'd spend the rest of my life trying to hear that sound again.

title: Falling Without a Parachute
description: That quiet moment when I realized this wasn't just a crush anymore â€” this was love, deep and unshakeable.

title: Asking You to Be Mine
description: Every moment has led to this one. I'm standing here, heart wide open, asking you to be my Valentine â€” today and every day after.
